songs.title: Ease My Mind
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do

[Verse 1]
I hear you like a whisper
In the corner of my lovesick thoughts
Like sand through a filter
Trying to capture what time forgot
I need you to be here
I need to see you crystal clear
Like diamonds in a coal mine
In the moonlight when you appear

[Chorus]
Girl ease my mind
Liquify
I need you mine
Can't fake it
'Cause you haunt me, baby
'Cause you haunt me, baby

[Interlude]
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do

[Verse 2]
I feel you in the wind chill
And it's so real, straight through my bones
I can only just imagine
Your passion, you take me home
I need you to be here
I need to see you crystal clear
Like rubies in the red night
In the dark sky when you appear

[Chorus]
Girl ease my mind
Liquify
I need you mine
Can't fake it
'Cause you haunt me, baby
'Cause you haunt me, baby

[Interlude]
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do

[Bridge]
Haunt me to my grave
Don't you ever fade away
Seeing every delusion
I dont want to face
You keep me up
You keep me up at night

[Chorus]
Girl ease my mind
Liquify
I need you mine
Can't fake it
'Cause you haunt me, baby
'Cause you haunt me, baby

[Interlude]
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do

[Chorus]
Girl ease my mind
Liquify
I need you mine
Can't fake it
'Cause you haunt me, baby
'Cause you haunt me, baby
